Plot: A dealer in "outsider" art travels from Chicago to North Carolina to meet her new in-laws, challenging the equilibrium of this middle class Southern home.
Title: Junebug
Actors: Embeth Davidtz, David Kuhn, Alessandro Nivola, Alicia Van Couvering
tomatoConsensus: Aided and abetted by a wonderful cast, director Phil Morrison transforms familiar material into an understated and resonant comedy.
Awards: Nominated for 1 Oscar. Another 21 wins & 25 nominations.
